add-url-info: Please provide the URL of the website for which you would like to obtain certificate information &#8211
add-url-rule: The URL must start with "https://" (e.g., https://www.example.com).
click-to-add-new: Click here to add new certificate
click-to-send-email: Click here to move to send another recovery email.
colourLegendDescription: This is a visual notification of the expiry date of the certificate. The colour of the icon will change depending on the number of days left until the certificate expires.

index-para1: Empower Your Security with TLS and SSL Certificate Tracker: Stay Informed, Stay Secured.
index-para2: Our user-friendly, secure, and innovative web application simplifies certificate management, making it easier than ever to keep track of your valuable credentials.
index-subheader3-1-para: Simply enter the URL associated with your certificate, and our system will automatically fetch and store the certificate's information, including its expiration date.
index-subheader3-2-para: Experience clarity at a glance. Our dynamic table visually alerts you with vibrant colors for each certificate, depending on how much time is left before expiration.                          Instantly identify certificates in need of attention and stay in control.
index-subheader3-3-para: Don't leave renewal to chance. Set your own timing for email notifications about certificates that are expiring soon.                          Tailor your reminders to suit your schedule and never miss a deadline again.
listOfCertificatesDescription: This is a list of all the certificates that are currently in the system. The list can be sorted by clicking on the column headers.
password-rule-2: include at least 1 number and 1 symbol
password-rules:
• be at least 6 characters longs
  • include at least 1 number and 1 symbol
  • match in both fields
  • cannot contain spaces
register-here: Register if you are a new user
urlRequest: Please provide the URL of the site you wish to check.
